About Me

My name is Eliyahu Kriel. I've always had a passion for computers and Internet, and today I am developing Internet applications. I'm looking for my next development challenge, and I'll be happy to hear suggestions from you.

My development skills

Specializing in new technologies, including ReactJS, NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB, JavaScript & ES6, Html,Css, Sass, Bootstrap, and more!

Why Me?

Because I am Fast and independent learner, Team Player, Committed to work, and Highly Motivated.


What Now?
